title: "Assignment 2"
---

```{r}
library(haven)
TEDS_2016<-read_stata("https://github.com/datageneration/home/blob/master/DataProgramming/data/TEDS_2016.dta?raw=true")
head(TEDS_2016)

data <- na.omit(TEDS_2016) 

model1 <-  lm(Tondu ~ female + DPP + age + income + edu + Taiwanese + Econ_worse, data = data)
summary(model1)

model2 <-  lm(votetsai ~ female + DPP + age + income + edu + Taiwanese + Econ_worse, data = data)
summary(model2)



with(TEDS_2016, table(Tondu))
prop.table(table(TEDS_2016$Tondu))

TEDS_2016$Tondu<-as.numeric(TEDS_2016$Tondu,labels=c("Unificationnow”,“Statusquo,unif.infuture”,“Statusquo,decidelater","Statusquoforever","Statusquo,indep.infuture","Independencenow”,“Noresponse"))


class(TEDS_2016$Tondu)
barplot(table(TEDS_2016$Tondu), xlab = "Tondu Responses", ylab = "Frequency")

```
